attributes.action: PIP amdendment Dyspraxia, MS, Dyslexia, for all disabilities
attributes.additional_details:
Amdend the PIP leglislation to be more resepentative of the problems disabled people face in daily life.

Include categories for writing, reading and memory, learning problems as well as a section for Insomina and fatigue.

I urge you to put in Section 11 where point can be awarded for miscleanous problems not mentioned in any of the descriptors. The maximum points for this should be 10 points.
Current descriptors in PIP does not reflect the many complexities disabled people face.
